unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get your popcorn ready! The festival season is upon us, and it’s shaping up to be a cracker.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get your popcorn ready! The festival season is upon us, and it’s shaping up to be a cracker. From Cannes to the Kolkata International Film Festival (K I F F), there's something for everyone. Early buzz suggests that regional cinema is really stealing the show this year, with independent filmmakers from Kerala, Karnataka, and even Assam making waves. Speaking of Kerala, word on the street is that the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K), later this year, is already planning a massive Onam celebration alongside the screenings. Imagine watching a compelling film and then digging into some delicious Onam Sadhya - pure bliss! Meanwhile, whispers are circulating about a possible Bollywood blockbuster premiere at the Jaipur International Film Festival in January. Could it be Ranbir Kapoor's next? Only time will tell! Keep those eyes peeled for more announcements folks. It's going to be a feast of cinematic biryani! Don’t miss out!

unnormalised: From Cannes to the Kolkata International Film Festival (KIFF), there's something for everyone. Early buzz suggests that regional cinema is really stealing the show this year, with independent filmmakers from Kerala, Karnataka, and even Assam making waves.

Speaking of Kerala, word on the street is that the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK), later this year, is already planning a massive Onam celebration alongside the screenings. Imagine watching a compelling film and then digging into some delicious Onam Sadhya - pure bliss!

Meanwhile, whispers are circulating about a possible Bollywood blockbuster premiere at the Jaipur International Film Festival in January. Could it be Ranbir Kapoor's next? Only time will tell! Keep those eyes peeled for more announcements folks. It's going to be a feast of cinematic biryani! Don’t miss out!
